questionText.text:
Write a cross-referencer that prints a list of all words in a document, and, for each word, a list of the line numbers on which it occurs. Remove stop words like "the," "and," and so on.

Download stopwords.txt from here
Download the document here
Write a program that prints the distinct words in its input sorted into decreasing order of frequency of occurrence. Precede each word by its count
